Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (13/03/2021)
-------------------
- First Release

0.0.2 (24/03/2021)
-------------------
- Added additional functionality

0.0.3 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Third Release

0.0.4 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Fourth Release

0.0.5 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Added Pin class

0.0.6 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Refactored code
- Removed Pin class
- Added Random-Word library

0.0.7 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Included PyYAML as a requirement (forgot to add it)

0.0.8 (25/03/2021)
-------------------
- Fixed bug for Memorable passwords
